GSD.product_version: versions from v4.10 to before v4.14.300
GSD.description:
macvlan: enforce a consistent minimal mtu

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.300 by commit d2fee7d121d189c6dc905b727d60e7043a6655bb, it was introduced in version v4.10 by commit 91572088e3fdbf4fe31cf397926d8b890fdb3237. For more details please see the references link.
